# eccVersion

**Instance Property**

The error correction version of the Data Matrix code symbol.

## Declaration

```swift
var eccVersion: CIDataMatrixCodeDescriptor.ECCVersion { get }
```

## Discussion

The possible error correction version are enumerated in [doc://com.apple.coreimage/documentation/CoreImage/CIDataMatrixCodeDescriptor/ECCVersion-swift.enum]. Any symbol with an even number of rows and columns will be ECC 200.

## Examining a Descriptor

- **errorCorrectedPayload**: The error-corrected payload containing the data encoded in the Data Matrix code symbol.
- **rowCount**: The number of rows in the Data Matrix code symbol.
- **columnCount**: The number of columns in the Data Matrix code symbol.
